About Madagascar Green Tours

Sustainable Tourism in Madagascar

At Madagascar Green Tours, we are dedicated to providing unforgettable travel experiences while preserving the unique biodiversity and cultural heritage of Madagascar. As a locally owned and operated tour company, we have deep roots in the communities we visit.

Our eco-friendly approach ensures that your adventure has a positive impact on both the environment and local communities. We work closely with conservation organizations and employ local guides who are passionate about sharing their knowledge and protecting their homeland.

  • Eco-friendly accommodations
  • Support for local communities
  • Conservation initiatives
  • Responsible wildlife viewing

Why Choose Us?

With over 15 years of experience, our team of expert guides will take you off the beaten path to discover the true essence of Madagascar. From the iconic Avenue of the Baobabs to the lush rainforests of Andasibe, we offer customized itineraries that cater to your interests and preferences.
